class_notes: The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines.  However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class.
course_description: Introduction to the US federal income tax system, with an emphasis on the taxation of individuals. Topics include tax status, dependents, gross income, self-employment income, investment income, itemized deductions, alternative minimum tax, tax credits, penalties, planning to minimize taxes.
